document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Artemel Villa (labeled 26) on Vondil Street.
document_data.name: Artemel Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Artemel Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Artemel]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located at the corner of [[Sul Street]] and [[Vondil Street]] in the northeast section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: Artemel Villa was composed of several two-storey structures that surrounded a central garden. The walled estate dominated much of the city block where is was located.
